name: Global Alliance for Patient Access
goal: GAfPA educates physicians and patients on health policy issues and developing education material and advocacy initiatives to promote informed policymaking.
euInitiatives:
GAfPA remains focused on identifying policies that impact patient access to approved therapeutic treatments.

GAfPA will follow and engage in activities related to DG SANTE, focused primarily on patient access policies and legislation. Contact and meetings with staff at the DG Health and Food Safety as well as the EU Parliament.
